content.prompt: A historian would most likely cite which of the following claims made in the second paragraph to demonstrate that Hindu teachings influenced the development of South Asian societies?

choices.label: There is no agriculture left because Indra now supports the Muslims.
The absence of dharma has caused nobleness and character to disappear.
The Hindu citizens of Madurai are perturbed by hearing parrots speaking Persian.
The Hindu citizens of Madurai protect the owls in their gardens because they are considered to be sacred birds.

topic.text: 1.3: Developments in South and Southeast Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
